title: Michelin - worldwide number of employees by region 2018
summary: In 2018 , Europe was the leading producer of Michelin oranges in the Michelin ( EU28 ) , with over 3.7 thousand employees .
North_America ranked in second place in second place with 21541 employees .
The Spanish Region of Michelin is the second largest country in the world and Region .
gold: The statistic shows the worldwide number of Michelin 's employees in 2018 , by region.
Michelin had 21,541 employees in North America in 2018.
In that same year , some 17.5 percent of their employees worldwide were women .
